definition: A term used to describe something that is difficult to comprehend or understand, often referring to a concept, text, or language that is unclear or incomprehensible. It is commonly used to express confusion or frustration when encountering complex or convoluted information.

examples.english: The book contains incomprehensible technical vocabulary.
The user manual is incomprehensible gibberish.
The teacher spoke incomprehensible standard German.

examples.german: Der Text ist voller unverständlicher Abkürzungen.
examples.english: The text is full of incomprehensible abbreviations.
